item.title: Third Base [Scott Galloway]
item.description: Third Base [Scott Galloway] [] Not recognizing your blessings feeds into the dark side of capitalism and meritocracy: success is a choice, and that those who havenâ€™t achieved success are not unlucky, but unworthy. I'm relatively lucky. I don't know how much of the techie hubris that I bear. I have unresolved feelings about meritocracy and fairness. Race is usually used as a proxy for bridging the gap, e.g. affirmative action at colleges.
